languages.text: {n}Абеляр становится белым как полотно.{/n} "Помилуйте, Лорд-капитан... это ж надо где-то место ей найти... держать под запором... она же разнесет половину палубы!"
{n}Abelard turns white as a sheet.{/n} "Begging your pardon, Lord Captain... Where would we even... We would have to keep it locked up... It will demolish half the deck!"
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр становится белым как полотно.{/n} "Помилуйте, Лорд-капитан... это ж надо где-то место ей найти... держать под запором... она же разнесет половину палубы!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard turns white as a sheet.{/n} "Begging your pardon, Lord Captain... Where would we even... We would have to keep it behind bars... It will demolish half the deck!"
{n}Abelard turns white as a sheet.{/n} "Begging your pardon, Lord Captain... Where would we even... We would have to keep it behind bars... It will demolish half the deck!"
{n}Abelard turns white as a sheet.{/n} "Begging your pardon, Lord Captain... Where would we even... We would have to keep it locked up... It will demolish half the deck!"
{n}Abelard turns white as a sheet.{/n} "Begging your pardon, Lord Captain... Where would we even... We would have to keep it locked up... It will demolish half the deck!"
{n}Abelard turns white as a sheet.{/n} "Begging your pardon, Lord Captain... Where would we even... We would have to keep it locked up... It will demolish half the deck!"

languages.text: {n}Abélard devient blanc comme un linge.{/n} « Je vous demande pardon, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais où pourrions-nous... Il faudrait l'enfermer quelque part... Elle risquerait de dévaster le vaisseau ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard turns white as a sheet.{/n} "Begging your pardon, Lord Captain... Where would we even... We would have to keep it locked up... It will demolish half the deck!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard devient blanc comme un linge.{/n} « Je vous demande pardon, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais où pourrions-nous... Il faudrait l'enfermer quelque part... Elle risquerait de dévaster le vaisseau ! »

languages.text: {n}Abelard wird kalkweiß.{/n} "Ich bitte um Verzeihung, Lord Captain ... Wo sollten wir überhaupt ... Wir müssten es einsperren ... Es wird das halbe Deck zerstören!"
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard turns white as a sheet.{/n} "Begging your pardon, Lord Captain... Where would we even... We would have to keep it locked up... It will demolish half the deck!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard wird kalkweiß.{/n} "Ich bitte um Verzeihung, Lord Captain ... Wo sollten wir überhaupt ... Wir müssten es einsperren ... Es wird das halbe Deck zerstören!"

languages.text: {n}Abelard palidece, volviéndose blanco como una sábana.{/n} «Le ruego que me perdone, Lord Capitán, pero... ¿Dónde vamos a...? Tendríamos que encerrarlo... ¡Va a destrozar la cubierta!».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard turns white as a sheet.{/n} "Begging your pardon, Lord Captain... Where would we even... We would have to keep it locked up... It will demolish half the deck!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard palidece, volviéndose blanco como una sábana.{/n} «Le ruego que me perdone, Lord Capitán, pero... ¿Dónde vamos a...? Tendríamos que encerrarlo... ¡Va a destrozar la cubierta!».

languages.text: {n}アベラルドが真っ青になる。{/n}「すみません、ロード・キャプテン…我らはいったいどこに…それを閉じ込めておかなければ…デッキの半分が破壊されてしまいます！」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard turns white as a sheet.{/n} "Begging your pardon, Lord Captain... Where would we even... We would have to keep it locked up... It will demolish half the deck!"

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドが真っ青になる。{/n}「すみません、ロード・キャプテン…我らはいったいどこに…それを閉じ込めておかなければ…デッキの半分が破壊されてしまいます！」

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德的脸色惨白如纸。{/n}“请原谅，舰长大人……我们到底该怎么……我们本该把它关起来才对……若是像这样放任不管，它恐怕会把半个甲板毁于一旦！”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard turns white as a sheet.{/n} "Begging your pardon, Lord Captain... Where would we even... We would have to keep it locked up... It will demolish half the deck!"

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德的脸色惨白如纸。{/n}“请原谅，舰长大人……我们到底该怎么……我们本该把它关起来才对……若是像这样放任不管，它恐怕会把半个甲板毁于一旦！”

languages.text: {n}Abelard bembeyaz oluyor.{/n} "Affınıza sığınarak Lord Kaptan... Böyle bir şeyi nerede... Yani kilit altında tutmamız şart. Güvertenin yarısını paramparça etmesin!"
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard turns white as a sheet.{/n} "Begging your pardon, Lord Captain... Where would we even... We would have to keep it locked up... It will demolish half the deck!"
